column1: 05:01|"Oh yes. His clocks were set at one minute past five
column2: four minutes past five and seven minutes past five. That was the combination number of a safe
column3: 515457. The safe was concealed behind a reproduction of the Mona Lisa. Inside the safe
column6: ""were the Crown Jewels of the Russian Royal Family."""|The Clocks|Agatha Christie

column1: 05:01|Just after five o'clock on this chill September morning
